content: cutest mini rainbow bee pattern available in english us terminology and french you can also find a complete video tutorial for this project on my youtube channel https //youtu be/lrq3nc9pkoq make sure to tag me on your social media so i can see your makes and share them yarn and colors for 6 different color combos are available in the pattern this pattern was inspired by the free mini pattern from emma_sue_designs https //www instagram com/p/ctnm_6arlaq/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igshid=mzrlodbinwflza==
